title: Elise spider form sounds dont work?
body:
Was in a normal game and was playing elise and i noticed that when in spider form there was no sound, no aa sound, emote sound, rappel sound, q lunge sound etc. their team also had an elise jungle and had the same problem.
Played her again just to make sure it wasnt a one off thing and again she had no spider form sounds. 
Just wondering if anyone is aware of this, not a big deal but i just like hearing the q lunge heartbeat pulsey sound thingy :D

replies.body:
Hey Athron! 

Thanks for the report! We're aware of the issue and are investigating.
